name: Irradiated Martial Artists
description:
This prototype was developed as an academic project at the Cologne Game Lab. It requires two players.

Gameplay

The aim of both players is to be the first to reach the sword placed at the center of the platform. In order to prevent the other from doing so, each must hit the other with fireballs to push them backwards while also trying to evade incoming fireballs by jumping over or sliding under them.

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Esc - Quit (at the title screen)
  • T/Y/G/H/I/O/K/L - Start / Return to title screen

Player 1:

  • WASD - Move
  • T - High fireball
  • Y - Low fireball
  • G - Jump (while moving forward)
  • H - Slide (while moving forward)

Player 2:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • I - High fireball
  • O - Low fireball
  • K - Jump (while moving forward)
  • L - Slide (while moving forward)

Xbox One / Xbox 360 controller:

  • Left analog stick - Move
  • X - High fireball
  • Y - Low fireball
  • A - Jump (while moving forward)
  • B - Slide (while moving forward)
  • Back button - Quit (at the title screen)

PS4 controller:

  • Left analog stick - Move
  • Circle - High fireball
  • Triangle - Low fireball
  • Square - Jump (while moving forward)
  • Cross - Slide (while moving forward)
  • L2 - Quit (at the title screen)
